CustomField.description: True if the Dynamic Current Date is between the Start and End Dates, or if End Date is blank or if the Asset Status equals Pending Renewal.
CustomField.formula: OR( AND (QS_Customer_Asset__r.QS_Dynamic_Current_Date__c >= QS_Start_Date__c ,QS_Customer_Asset__r.QS_Dynamic_Current_Date__c <= QS_End_Date__c), ISNULL(QS_End_Date__c ), QS_New_Asset_Status__c = 'Pending Renewal' )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: True if the Dynamic Current Date is between the Start and End Dates, or if End Date is blank or if the Asset Status equals Pending Renewal.
CustomField.label: Currently Active - Dynamic
